title: Cane Creek Offers GRX Spider for eeWings
content:
Cane Creek knows its eeWings owners run 2x GRX and so it developed a special spider just for Shimano’s 12-speed gravel interface. This chainring spider is the critical link between conventional (non-direct-mount) chainrings and Cane Creek’s eeWings crank arms. All Cane Creek spiders are fully CNC machined with pocketing to maintain stiffness while reducing weight, as well as clearly labeled specifications for easy identification and installation. The new GRX spider retails for $69.99 and is shipping today from Cane Creek.

The post Cane Creek Offers GRX Spider for eeWings appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
